value.condition: Substring(listitem.filename,sdtv) | Substring(listitem.filename,tvrip) | [[!Substring(listitem.filename,hdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bluray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,sddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,pdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.evo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.mt2s,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.ifo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.vob,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,r5) + !Substring(listitem.filename,dvdscr) + !Substring(listitem.filename,screener) + !Substring(listitem.filename,web-dl) + !Substring(listitem.filename,webrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,dvd)] + Container.Content(episodes) + [Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,SD) | Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,480) | Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,540) | Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,576)]]

[!ListItem.IsStereoscopic+!Substring(listitem.filename,3d)] + [Substring(listitem.filename,bluray) | Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) | Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) | Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) | Substring(listitem.filename,.mt2s,Right) | Substring(listitem.filename,.bdmv,Right) |[[!Substring(listitem.filename,sddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,tvrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,pdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,sdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.evo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.ifo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.vob,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,r5) + !Substring(listitem.filename,dvdscr) + !Substring(listitem.filename,screener) + !Substring(listitem.filename,web-dl) + !Substring(listitem.filename,webrip)] + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(MusicVideos)] + [IsEmpty(ListItem.VideoResolution) |Substring(ListItem.VideoResolution,720) | Substring(ListItem.VideoResolution,1080) | Substring(ListItem.VideoResolution,4K)]]]

[ListItem.IsStereoscopic | Substring(ListItem.StereoscopicMode,split_) | Substring(ListItem.StereoscopicMode,anaglyph_) | Substring(listitem.filename,3d)] + [Substring(listitem.filename,bluray) | Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) | Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) | Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) | Substring(listitem.filename,.mt2s,Right)Substring(listitem.filename,.bdmv,Right) | [[!Substring(listitem.filename,sddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,tvrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,pdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,sdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.evo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.ifo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.vob,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,r5) + !Substring(listitem.filename,dvdscr) + !Substring(listitem.filename,screener) + !Substring(listitem.filename,web-dl) + !Substring(listitem.filename,webrip)] + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(MusicVideos)] + [IsEmpty(ListItem.VideoResolution) |Substring(ListItem.VideoResolution,720) | Substring(ListItem.VideoResolution,1080) | Substring(ListItem.VideoResolution,4K)]]]

[Substring(listitem.filename,dvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hd-dvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bluray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,r5) + !Substring(listitem.filename,dvdscr) + !Substring(listitem.filename,screener) + !Substring(listitem.filename,web-dl) + !Substring(listitem.filename,webrip)] | Substring(listitem.filename,.ifo,Right) | Substring(listitem.filename,.vob,Right) | [[!Substring(listitem.filename,hddvd) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bluray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,blu-ray) + !Substring(listitem.filename,brrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,bdrip) + !Substring(listitem.filename,sdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,hdtv) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.evo,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,.m2ts,Right) + !Substring(listitem.filename,r5) + !Substring(listitem.filename,dvdscr) + !Substring(listitem.filename,screener) + !Substring(listitem.filename,web-dl) + !Substring(listitem.filename,webrip)] + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(MusicVideos)] + [Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,SD) | Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,480) | Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,540) | Substring(listitem.VideoResolution,576)]]

10 990 1500 110 left 2 horizontal Animation_FadedByMenu Animation_CommonFade !Substring(Container.FolderPath,plugin) Container.Content(movies)| Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(MusicVideos) VisibleIfNotMovieSet

156 81 MediaFlagDiffuse flags/flag_frame.png
7 15 110 70 $VAR[chronotoolstexture] scale MediaFlagDiffuse
8 23 chronotoolsV
!IsEmpty(ListItem.Duration)|[Skin.HasSetting(Show_HeureFin)+!IsEmpty(Window(10000).Property(DurationTools))] !Container.Content(seasons)+!Container.Content(tvshows)
118 120 center
135 81 MediaFlagDiffuse flags/flag_frame.png
3 130 70 keep resource://resource.images.studios.coloured/$INFO[ListItem.Studio].png MediaFlagDiffuse
!StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) 85 93
MediaFlagsVarsSquare Star.png stretch RatingStarDiffuse !Substring(Container.FolderPath,advanced.launcher)
15 MediaFlagsVarsSquare center center $VAR[StarRating] yellow METF_StarRating !Substring(Container.FolderPath,advanced.launcher)
MediaFlagsVarsSquare special://skin/extras/games/genres/$INFO[ListItem.Genre,,.png] stretch MediaFlagDiffuse !IsEmpty(ListItem.Genre) + Substring(Container.FolderPath,advanced.launcher)
2 99 81 flags/flag_frame.png stretch MediaFlagDiffuse
!IsEmpty(ListItem.Year) 135 120
156 81 MediaFlagDiffuse flags/flag_frame.png
auto 30 10 50 center chicken white [I]$INFO[ListItem.Year][/I]
75 80 Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(episodes)| Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(MusicVideos) !IsEmpty(ListItem.Mpaa)
10 8 60 60 keep $VAR[MPAATexture] MediaFlagDiffuse
-2 90 81 MediaFlagDiffuse flags/flag_frame.png
-->
